support_tickets.title: Fabric query latency degradation — supply chain pipeline
support_tickets.description: P95 query latency increased from 1.2s to 4.2s over 30 days. Affecting daily supply chain reporting for 200+ users.

support_tickets.title: Copilot response quality in Teams meetings
support_tickets.description: Meeting summaries occasionally missing action items. Resolved with tenant-level Copilot configuration update.

expansion_opportunities.notes: Strong ROI data from initial 5K rollout. 78% adoption, 4.2 satisfaction. Sarah advocating internally.
Capacity utilization at 87%. Need to resolve P2 latency ticket first to build confidence.
Sarah requested AI strategy briefing. Bottling operations automation is the initial use case.

support_tickets.title: AKS node pool autoscaling delays during peak traffic
support_tickets.description: AKS cluster autoscaler was slow to provision new nodes during traffic spikes to their SaaS platform. Resolved by adjusting autoscaler profile and enabling node pool prewarming.

expansion_opportunities.proposed: AI Foundry embedded in Contoso SaaS product
expansion_opportunities.notes: Contoso wants to embed AI Foundry capabilities directly into their SaaS platform for customer-facing AI features. Marcus is VP of Product and has board-level buy-in. POC completed successfully in January.
87% adoption rate across initial 3K rollout. Angela (CIO) approved full org-wide deployment. Negotiating volume discount for remaining 5K seats.

support_tickets.title: Azure Migrate — VMware vSphere batch replication failures
support_tickets.description: Batch replication of 40 VMware workloads to Azure failing intermittently at 60-70% completion. Impacting Phase 2 of cloud migration timeline. Plant floor ERP system migration delayed.

expansion_opportunities.notes: Lisa (CISO) interested in E5 security features — Defender for Endpoint and Purview. Compliance requirements driving urgency. Needs business case for CFO.
Pilot program for engineering and management teams. Lisa wants to see E5 upgrade first before adding Copilot. Dependent on E3-to-E5 migration.
Raj (Head of Data) sees potential for Fabric in manufacturing analytics but wants to prove value with current F32 first. Utilization still at 42%. Revisit after 90 days.

support_tickets.title: Dynamics 365 Commerce — POS integration sync delays
support_tickets.description: Point-of-sale terminals in 15 retail locations experiencing 10-15 minute delays syncing inventory data with Dynamics 365 Commerce. Causing intermittent stock-level inaccuracies on e-commerce storefront.

expansion_opportunities.notes: Pilot showed strong results for store operations managers. Karen (COO) wants to roll out to all store managers, merchandising, and corporate staff. Business case presented to board in March.

Tom (VP Analytics) exploring Fabric for unified retail analytics — customer segmentation, demand forecasting, and inventory optimization. Currently using a mix of Power BI Premium and third-party tools.

support_tickets.title: Compliance audit finding — Azure AD conditional access policy gap
support_tickets.description: Internal audit identified that 3 legacy service accounts bypass conditional access policies in Entra ID. Regulatory remediation deadline of March 31. Requires immediate attention for SOX and FFIEC compliance.

support_tickets.title: Fabric data pipeline latency for end-of-day settlement reports
support_tickets.description: End-of-day settlement report pipeline in Fabric taking 45 minutes instead of target 15 minutes. Resolved by optimizing Spark job configuration and increasing executor memory allocation.

expansion_opportunities.proposed: Full confidential computing for trading workloads
expansion_opportunities.notes: Daniel (CTO) wants to move all trading and risk calculation workloads to Azure Confidential Computing. Board has regulatory pressure. Competing Google Cloud proposal on the table — must demonstrate differentiated security posture.

expansion_opportunities.proposed: AI Foundry for credit risk modeling and fraud detection
expansion_opportunities.notes: Samira (Chief Risk Officer) exploring AI-powered risk modeling. Needs to satisfy model governance and explainability requirements for banking regulators. POC scope being defined.

support_tickets.title: Azure ExpressRoute — mainframe connectivity intermittent drops
support_tickets.description: ExpressRoute circuit to on-premises mainframe data center experiencing brief connectivity drops (2-5 seconds) 3-4 times per day. Impacting batch data synchronization between mainframe claims system and Azure SQL. Suspected BGP route flapping.

expansion_opportunities.notes: Robert (VP Infrastructure) has a 3-year mainframe exit strategy. Phase 1 is in progress. Phases 2-4 would move claims processing, policy administration, and actuarial workloads to Azure. Slow-moving due to change advisory board process.

Nina (CISO) interested in Purview for insurance regulatory compliance and Defender for identity protection. Budget approval likely requires FY2027 planning cycle. Earliest deployment would be Q2 2027.
Robert curious about Copilot for IT productivity but no formal evaluation started. Wants to see E5 upgrade happen first. Very conservative adoption culture.

support_tickets.title: Azure AI Services — image recognition model accuracy drop
support_tickets.description: Custom Vision model for toy safety inspection dropped from 96% to 88% accuracy after retraining. Resolved by reverting to previous model version and retraining with corrected labeled dataset.

expansion_opportunities.notes: Julie (IT Director) ready to move to E3 as the company grows past the Business Premium 300-seat sweet spot. Headcount expected to reach 1000 by Q4 2026. Need enterprise admin capabilities.

expansion_opportunities.proposed: Full D2C platform — AKS, Azure Front Door, Cosmos DB
expansion_opportunities.notes: Brian (VP Digital) wants to build a direct-to-consumer platform with personalized toy recommendations using Azure AI. Currently evaluating Azure vs. Shopify Plus. Architecture workshop scheduled for March.
92% adoption and 4.7 satisfaction on initial 200-seat rollout — best Copilot metrics in the territory. Julie wants full company deployment. Negotiating bundled pricing with E3 upgrade.

support_tickets.title: Azure App Service — seasonal autoscale not triggering properly
support_tickets.description: Booking platform App Service plan not scaling up during peak ski season traffic. Autoscale rules based on CPU percentage not triggering despite 85%+ utilization. Customers experiencing 8-10 second page load times during peak hours.

expansion_opportunities.notes: Hannah (GM) saw a Copilot demo at a hospitality conference and expressed interest for front desk and marketing teams. Budget is tight — needs clear ROI justification for a seasonal business.

expansion_opportunities.proposed: Azure AI for guest personalization and dynamic pricing
expansion_opportunities.notes: Hannah wants to use AI for personalized guest experiences — ski lesson recommendations, restaurant preferences, dynamic lift ticket pricing. Evaluated a competitor solution but budget may favor Azure-integrated approach.

support_tickets.title: Teams Rooms — display connectivity issues in lecture halls
support_tickets.description: Teams Rooms devices in 8 out of 42 lecture halls intermittently losing display connection during classes. Faculty reporting disruptions to hybrid lectures. Suspected firmware compatibility issue with recently upgraded AV equipment.

expansion_opportunities.notes: Dr. Osei (Provost) interested in Copilot pilot for faculty and administrative staff. Wants to evaluate impact on research paper drafting, grant writing, and administrative efficiency. Faculty senate approval required.

expansion_opportunities.proposed: Azure HPC and GPU instances for research computing
expansion_opportunities.notes: Dr. Marsh (VP Research) looking to replace aging on-prem HPC cluster. Genomics, climate modeling, and computational chemistry departments all requesting GPU resources. NSF grant funding may cover 40% of costs.

expansion_opportunities.proposed: Fabric F32 for student analytics and institutional research
expansion_opportunities.notes: Dr. Osei exploring Fabric for student retention analytics, enrollment forecasting, and accreditation reporting. Currently using fragmented Excel-based processes. Would need to consolidate 12 separate data sources.

support_tickets.title: Azure CDN — elevated latency in Asia-Pacific regions
support_tickets.description: CDN edge nodes in Tokyo, Singapore, and Sydney reporting 300-500ms additional latency for video segment delivery. Affecting streaming quality for 2.8M subscribers in APAC region. P95 rebuffer rate increased from 0.8% to 3.2%.

support_tickets.title: Azure Media Services — encoding pipeline intermittent failures
support_tickets.description: 4K HDR encoding jobs failing at 15% rate due to memory allocation issues in Media Services encoder. Resolved by migrating to updated encoding preset and increasing reserved unit allocation.

expansion_opportunities.proposed: Azure OpenAI + AI Foundry for personalized content recommendations
expansion_opportunities.notes: Sophie (VP Product) wants to replace their homegrown recommendation engine with Azure OpenAI-powered personalization. Internal A/B test showed 23% improvement in watch time. Architecture review completed, moving to contract negotiation.

expansion_opportunities.proposed: Fabric F64 for viewer analytics and content performance
expansion_opportunities.notes: Amir (Head of Data) currently running Snowflake for viewer analytics. Exploring Fabric as potential consolidation play — would unify content performance, ad revenue, and subscriber analytics. Cost comparison underway.

expansion_opportunities.proposed: AI Foundry for content moderation and auto-tagging
expansion_opportunities.notes: Sophie exploring AI Foundry for automated content moderation, metadata tagging, and subtitle generation across 40+ languages. Currently spending $1.2M/year on manual content moderation.

support_tickets.title: SECURITY — Unauthorized access attempt on Azure healthcare data platform
support_tickets.description: Microsoft Defender for Cloud detected unauthorized access attempts targeting the Azure API for FHIR endpoint containing PHI. 47 failed authentication attempts from 3 external IP addresses over 6 hours. No confirmed data exfiltration but incident response protocol activated. HIPAA breach notification assessment in progress. Executive leadership and legal team engaged.

support_tickets.title: HIPAA audit remediation — Azure Key Vault rotation policy gaps
support_tickets.description: External HIPAA audit identified that 12 Azure Key Vault secrets used for inter-service authentication have not been rotated in 180+ days, violating organization's 90-day rotation policy. Must remediate before audit response deadline of March 15.

expansion_opportunities.notes: Dr. Nguyen (CMIO) wants to expand Copilot to all physicians and clinical staff for documentation, discharge summaries, and care coordination. Pilot showed 40% reduction in documentation time. HIPAA compliance review for clinical use cases must be completed first. P1 security incident may delay approval timeline.

expansion_opportunities.current_state: Azure API for FHIR with basic integrations
expansion_opportunities.proposed: Full Azure Health Data Services with de-identification and analytics
expansion_opportunities.notes: David (CTO) wants to build a unified patient data platform using Azure Health Data Services. Would consolidate 5 separate EHR integrations. Dependent on resolving P1 security incident and demonstrating enhanced security posture.

Clinical trials analytics workload growing rapidly. 3 new Phase III trials launching in Q3 2026 will double data volume. Current F64 capacity projected to be insufficient by August. Dr. Nguyen has budget pre-approved for upgrade.
